Uses of Interface
javafx.scene.control.Toggle

  • Packages that use Toggle 
    Package Description
    javafx.scene.control
    The JavaFX User Interface Controls (UI Controls or just Controls) are specialized Nodes in the JavaFX Scenegraph especially suited for reuse in many different application contexts.

    • Uses of Toggle in javafx.scene.control

      Classes in javafx.scene.control that implement Toggle 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RadioButton
      RadioButtons create a series of items where only one item can be selected.
      class  RadioMenuItem
      A RadioMenuItem is a MenuItem that can be toggled (it uses the Toggle mixin).
      class  ToggleButton
      A ToggleButton is a specialized control which has the ability to be selected.
      Fields in javafx.scene.control with type parameters of type Toggle 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ReadOnlyObjectWrapper<Toggle> ToggleGroup.selectedToggle 
      private ObservableList<Toggle> ToggleGroup.toggles 
      private java.util.Collection<? extends Toggle> ToggleGroupBuilder.toggles 
      Methods in javafx.scene.control that return Toggle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Toggle ToggleGroup.getSelectedToggle()
      Gets the selected Toggle.
      Methods in javafx.scene.control that return types with arguments of type Toggle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ObservableList<Toggle> ToggleGroup.getToggles()
      The list of toggles within the ToggleGroup.
      ReadOnlyObjectProperty<Toggle> ToggleGroup.selectedToggleProperty()
      The selected toggle.
      Methods in javafx.scene.control with parameters of type Toggle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ToggleGroup.selectToggle(Toggle value)
      Selects the toggle.
      private boolean ToggleGroup.setSelected(Toggle toggle, boolean selected) 
      B ToggleGroupBuilder.toggles(Toggle... x)
      Add the given items to the List of items in the toggles property for the instance constructed by this builder.
      Method parameters in javafx.scene.control with type arguments of type Toggle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      B ToggleGroupBuilder.toggles(java.util.Collection<? extends Toggle> x)
      Add the given items to the List of items in the toggles property for the instance constructed by this builder.
